DOC.brief_summary: This study : - Evaluate effect magnetic therapy peripheral neuropathy diabetic patient . - Evaluate effect laser therapy peripheral neuropathy diabetic patient . - Compare effect magnetic therapy laser therapy peripheral neuropathy diabetic patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Electromagnetic Therapy Versus Laser Therapy Peripheral Diabetic Neuropathy
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty- five male female diabetic patient peripheral neuropathy select participate study . They equally divide two group Group-I : Twenty five patient diabetic peripheral neuropathy expose low intensity pulse magnetic therapy Group-II : Twenty five patient diabetic peripheral neuropathy expose 24 treatment session laser therapy Group-III 15 patient receive medical treatment
DOC.criteria: All diabetic patient peripheral neuropathy select participate study . Their age range 35 65 year old . All patient medical control ( optimal blood glucose ) . analgesic medication ( e.g . opiate , antidepressant , anticonvulsant diabetic drug control blood glucose ) . Patients DPN due cause diabetes Ulcers either foot Lack blood sugar control Other nervous system impairment Visual problem Unstable medical condition Pregnancy Metallic implant Alcohol drug abuse .
